title: [Ta'Vaalor, Victory Court]
[Ta'Vaalor, Tyrnian Court]
[Ta'Vaalor, King's Court]
description: Windowless and forbidding, the grey granite walls of the Hall of Justice sit squarely beneath the Keep.  Several city guardsmen patrol the tops of the crennelated walls while half a dozen guards flank the double doors leading into the Hall.  A large mithril plaque hangs from the rightmost ironbound door.
